item.title: List of Books Read So Far
item.description: This is a list of books I used to maintain at The TechGlider Forums, imported here for keeping it updated. Here I list the books I have read (only those whose names I remember) so far (in finishing order): Harry Potter and the Philosopher’s Stone, by J K Rowling Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets, by J K Rowling Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban, by J K Rowling
